name: Tesla AI Training Tool
description:
Loosely based off of the MIT Moral Machine, this game puts the player in the position as a Tesla(TM) Truck(TM) that must make moral decisions. This was part of an assignment where the goal was to instill "challenge" into a Bitsy game, so I decided to make the challenge based off of tough moral quandaries a-la the Trolley Problem.

This game was created as part of the Tiny Games class at the ATLAS Institute at The University of Colorado Boulder
